text: “isrāyīla paramparā daruvanṭa (ohuva) ek nabivarayeku vaśayenda pat karanu æta” (yayi deviyan pævasuvēya. pasuva īsā ipadī tama taruṇa viyaṭa pat vī isrāyīl paramparā daruvan veta giya avasthāvēdī ovunṭa mesē pævasuvēya): “niyata vaśayenma mā obagē deviyan vetin (yavanu læbū ek nabivarayeku yannaṭa) ek prātihāryayak samaga pæmiṇa ættemi. oba venuven mæṭi valin pakṣiyekugē hæḍaruva men am̆bā mā eyaṭa pim̆binnemi. allāhgē anumætiyaṭa anuva eya (paṇa æti) pakṣiyeku bavaṭa pat vanu æta. allāhgē anumætiyaṭa anuva uppattiyenma andhayinvada, kuṣṭa (lāduru) rogīnvada mā suva karannemi. maraṇayaṭa pat vūvanṭada mā paṇa dennemi. oba anubhava kaḷa dæyada, oba niveshi ekkāsu kara æti dæyada, mā obaṭa dænum dennemi. ættenma oba viśvāsaya tæbūvan vaśayen siṭinnehu nam meyin obaṭa (tṛptiyak læbiya hæki) sādhakayak ættēya”
